alert.note: Alert for Allen; Beauregard; Northern Acadia; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 4:14PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Jefferson Davis, southwestern Evangeline, southeastern Beauregard, northwestern Acadia, northeastern Calcasieu and Allen Parishes through 445 PM CDT... At 414 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oberlin, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kinder, Basile, Oberlin, Elton, Fenton, Reeves, Dry Creek, Mittie, Moss Bluff, Buller, Harmony, Topsy, Pine Island, Leblanc, Bond and Hathaway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Beauregard; Northern Acadia; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis
